item.description:
Bridges Meet and Mingle Dance Party
Friday, August 20.
8:00 PM to Midnight.

The Highlander Conference Center
2 Highlander Way
Manchester 03103
603-206-0629

Admission $15 before 9pm $17 after 9pm
Proper dress required: please no jeans, sneakers or, work boots.

Please join Steve O and Joan Dg7 and 100-150 people for an evening of dancing, drinks, hors oeuvres and, socializing in a tasteful setting. Meet and dance with a wide variety of people and ages; friends old and new. NEW Jukebox/ DJ where you can select the music you want to hear and dance to ( with one free selection). Complimentary hors dâ€™oeuvre buffet and cash bar.

Please come as close to 8pm as possible to mingle and be introduced. Because of the large number of people attending, it will be difficult for Steve O. to make introductions all evening (look for the Meetup signs on tables).
Hosts: Steve O. 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net or Joan 305-7114 ob@tds.net

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Meet and Mingle dance party
